Toolkit of Enoch

Spirit

Spirit is mainly designed for system level IO. With it, you can operate the standard logging with defined level; you can parse query string and post data from web requests; you can output HTML codes with template, or standard JSON format response for API.

LibSession

LibSession is an implementation of interface SessionHandlerInterface, using file system to store the session data. It should be run before any processing code relying on session management.

LibMySQL

LibMySQL is a helper based on PDO for MySQL.

LibMail

LibMail is a helper based on PHPMail, which is licensed under LGPL v2.

LibSFTP

LibSFTP is a helper based on SSH2.
